#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
const int SIZE = 1e5+1;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
int arr[SIZE];
int n;

ll pow7(int y)
{
ll res=1,x=7;
while(y)
{
    if(y&1)
    {
        res*=x;
        res%=mod;
    }
    x*=x;
    x%=mod;
    y>>=1;
}
return res;
}

int scan()
{
   int x=0;
   register char c=getchar_unlocked();
   while(c<'0'||c>'9')
   {
         c=getchar_unlocked();
   }
   while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
   {
       x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
       c=getchar_unlocked();
   }
   return x;
}

void fastWrite(ll x)
{
    char s[25];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=x%10+'0';
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    --l;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l--]);
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
    return;
}





int main()
{
   int tt;
   int n;
   tt=scan();
   while(tt--)
   {   n=scan();
       fastWrite(pow7(n));}
   return 0;
}
